sentence: Meanwhile,  Israeli  forces  have  been  bombarding  parts  of  Gaza  overnight  ,  with  nine  people  reportedly  killed  in  Rafah.
The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says  at  least  34,049  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  during  Israel's  offensive  there.
Israeli  troops  began  an  offensive  following  the  7  October  attack,  in  which  Hamas  fighters  killed  about  1,200  people  in  southern  Israel.
